name: 恐怖のツメ
effects: Physical damage (4x, ATK) to one enemy (ignore cover)
Inflict Stop (30%) for 3 turns on one enemy

desc_short.1: 對1名敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊+停止
desc_short.0: Deal partial unmitigated damage and chance of stopping one enemy
desc_short.5: Inflige daño absoluto parcial y paro a un enemigo
desc_short.4: Fügt einem Gegner teilweise direkten Schaden zu und stoppt ihn.

desc_long.1: 對1名敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊並追加停止效果。
desc_long.0: Deals damage partially unaffected by DEF to one enemy and chance of stopping them.
desc_long.2: 적 1명에게 일부 방어 무시 피해를 주고, 스톱을 부여합니다.
desc_long.4: Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu, der teilweise die Abwehr umgeht, und stoppt ihn.
